summary: Panel pricing updates and new panel entry were added in frontend/src/data/panels.ts. However, thereâ€™s no direct diff evidence that UI rendering locations (Available Panels grid/search/filter/Pricing Table) were updated to include or reflect the new panel/prices beyond relying on the shared data source. Also, two meta/state files were changed with unrelated feature descriptions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the new "SILENT AIM KRIPTON" panel everywhere panels are rendered (Available Panels grid, search/filter, and the Pricing Table).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows the new panel added to the catalog data source. There are no shown changes to any UI components/sections to confirm that all rendering locations (grid, search/filter, pricing table) pick up and display the new entry.

missing_requirements.requirement: Panels UI cards (Available Panels) and the Pricing Table reflect updated INTERNAL and AIMBOT VISIBLE prices.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows catalog pricing changes in the data source, but provides no direct evidence of UI updates/verification in the panels grid/cards or pricing table rendering.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated documentation/state summaries describing broad UI redesign changes (Tailwind/CSS/theme, navigation, payment wizard, contact links, etc.) not requested in this BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest scope is limited to panel catalog/pricing changes in frontend/src/data/panels.ts (and explicitly says keep backend/payment flow/link behavior unchanged). The diff indicates modifications to frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json that describe additional unrelated changes.
